+   // æ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ é…ç½®
+   upload: {
+     directory: process.env.UPLOAD_DIR || 'uploads',
+     maxSize: parseInt(process.env.MAX_FILE_SIZE) || 5 * 1024 * 1024 // 5MB
+   }
+ };

+ /**
+  * ç»Ÿä¸€å“åº”æ ¼å¼å·¥å…·
+  */
+ 
+ class Response {
+   /**
+    * æˆåŠŸå“åº”
+    */
+   static success(res, data = null, message = 'success', code = 200) {
+     return res.status(200).json({
+       code,
+       message,
+       data,
+       timestamp: Date.now()
+     });
+   }
+ 
+   /**
+    * å¤±è´¥å“åº”
+    */
+   static error(res, message = 'error', code = 400, errors = null) {
+     const response = {
+       code,
+       message,
+       timestamp: Date.now()
+     };
+     
+     if (errors) {
+       response.errors = errors;
+     }
+     
+     return res.status(code >= 500 ? 500 : code >= 400 ? code : 400).json(response);
+   }
+ 
+   /**
+    * åˆ†é¡µå“åº”
+    */
+   static paginate(res, data, pagination, message = 'success') {
+     return res.status(200).json({
+       code: 200,
+       message,
+       data,
+       pagination: {
+         page: pagination.page,
+         pageSize: pagination.pageSize,
+         total: pagination.total,
+         totalPages: Math.ceil(pagination.total / pagination.pageSize)
+       },
+       timestamp: Date.now()
+     });
+   }
+ 
+   /**
+    * åˆ›å»ºæˆåŠŸå“åº”
+    */
+   static created(res, data, message = 'created') {
+     return res.status(201).json({
+       code: 201,
+       message,
+       data,
+       timestamp: Date.now()
+     });
+   }
+ 
+   /**
+    * æ— å†…å®¹å“åº”
+    */
+   static noContent(res) {
+     return res.status(204).send();
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ module.exports = Response;
+ 
```

+ /**
+  * éªŒè¯ç»“æœå¤„ç†ä¸­é—´ä»¶
+  */
+ const handleValidationErrors = (req, res, next) => {
+   const errors = validationResult(req);
+   if (!errors.isEmpty()) {
+     return res.status(400).json({
+       code: 400,
+       message: 'å‚æ•°éªŒè¯å¤±è´¥',
+       errors: errors.array().map(err => ({
+         field: err.path,
+         message: err.msg
+       })),
+       timestamp: Date.now()
+     });
+   }
+   next();
+ };
+ 
+ /**
+  * ç”¨æˆ·æ³¨å†ŒéªŒè¯è§„åˆ™
+  */
+ const registerValidation = [
+   body('username')
+     .trim()
+     .isLength({ min: 3, max: 20 })
+     .withMessage('ç”¨æˆ·åé•¿åº¦å¿…é¡»åœ¨3-20ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¹‹é—´')
+     .matches(/^[a-zA-Z0-9_]+$/)
+     .withMessage('ç”¨æˆ·ååªèƒ½åŒ…å«å­—æ¯ã€æ•°å­—å’Œä¸‹åˆ’çº¿'),
+   
+   body('email')
+     .trim()
+     .isEmail()
+     .withMessage('è¯·è¾“å…¥æœ‰æ•ˆçš„é‚®ç®±åœ°å€')
+     .normalizeEmail(),
+   
+   body('password')
+     .isLength({ min: 6, max: 20 })
+     .withMessage('å¯†ç é•¿åº¦å¿…é¡»åœ¨6-20ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¹‹é—´'),
+   
+   body('confirmPassword')
+     .custom((value, { req }) => value === req.body.password)
+     .withMessage('ä¸¤æ¬¡è¾“å…¥çš„å¯†ç ä¸ä¸€è‡´'),
+   
+   handleValidationErrors
+ ];

+  * ç”¨æˆ·ç™»å½•éªŒè¯è§„åˆ™
+  */
+ const loginValidation = [
+   body('username')
+     .trim()
+     .notEmpty()
+     .withMessage('ç”¨æˆ·åä¸èƒ½ä¸ºç©º'),
+   
+   body('password')
+     .notEmpty()
+     .withMessage('å¯†ç ä¸èƒ½ä¸ºç©º'),

+   
+   handleValidationErrors
+ ];

+  * åˆ†é¡µå‚æ•°éªŒè¯

+   query('page')
+     .optional()
+     .isInt({ min: 1 })
+     .withMessage('é¡µç å¿…é¡»æ˜¯å¤§äº0çš„æ•´æ•°')
+     .toInt(),
+   
+   query('pageSize')
+     .optional()
+     .isInt({ min: 1, max: 100 })
+     .withMessage('æ¯é¡µæ•°é‡å¿…é¡»åœ¨1-100ä¹‹é—´')
+     .toInt(),
+   
+   handleValidationErrors
+ ];
+

+   handleValidationErrors,
+   registerValidation,
+   loginValidation,
+   idValidation,
+   paginationValidation

@@ -1,1 +1,89 @@
- 
+ const jwt = require('jsonwebtoken');
+ const config = require('../config');
+ const Response = require('../utils/response');
+ 
+ /**
+  * JWTè®¤è¯ä¸­é—´ä»¶
+  */
+ const authenticate = async (req, res, next) => {
+   try {
+     // è·å–token
+     const authHeader = req.headers.authorization;
+     
+     if (!authHeader || !authHeader.startsWith('Bearer ')) {
+       return Response.error(res, 'æœªæä¾›è®¤è¯ä»¤ç‰Œ', 401);
+     }
+     
+     const token = authHeader.substring(7); // ç§»é™¤ "Bearer " å‰ç¼€
+     
+     // éªŒè¯token
+     const decoded = jwt.verify(token, config.jwt.secret);
+     
+     // å°†ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯é™„åŠ åˆ°è¯·æ±‚å¯¹è±¡
+     req.user = {
+       id: decoded.id,
+       username: decoded.username,
+       email: decoded.email,
+       role: decoded.role
+     };
+     
+     next();
+   } catch (error) {
+     if (error.name === 'TokenExpiredError') {
+       return Response.error(res, 'ä»¤ç‰Œå·²è¿‡æœŸ', 401);
+     } else if (error.name === 'JsonWebTokenError') {
+       return Response.error(res, 'æ— æ•ˆçš„ä»¤ç‰Œ', 401);
+     }
+     return Response.error(res, 'è®¤è¯å¤±è´¥', 401);
+   }
+ };
+ 
+ /**
+  * å¯é€‰è®¤è¯ä¸­é—´ä»¶ï¼ˆä¸å¼ºåˆ¶è¦æ±‚ç™»å½•ï¼‰
+  */
+ const optionalAuthenticate = async (req, res, next) => {
+   try {
+     const authHeader = req.headers.authorization;
+     
+     if (authHeader && authHeader.startsWith('Bearer ')) {
+       const token = authHeader.substring(7);
+       const decoded = jwt.verify(token, config.jwt.secret);
+       
+       req.user = {
+         id: decoded.id,
+         username: decoded.username,
+         email: decoded.email,
+         role: decoded.role
+       };
+     }
+     
+     next();
+   } catch (error) {
+     // è®¤è¯å¤±è´¥ä¸é˜»æ­¢è¯·æ±‚ï¼Œç»§ç»­æ‰§è¡Œ
+     next();
+   }
+ };
+ 
+ /**
+  * è§’è‰²éªŒè¯ä¸­é—´ä»¶
+  */
+ const authorize = (...roles) => {
+   return (req, res, next) => {
+     if (!req.user) {
+       return Response.error(res, 'è¯·å…ˆç™»å½•', 401);
+     }
+     
+     if (!roles.includes(req.user.role)) {
+       return Response.error(res, 'æƒé™ä¸è¶³', 403);
+     }
+     
+     next();
+   };
+ };
+ 
+ module.exports = {
+   authenticate,
+   optionalAuthenticate,
+   authorize
+ };
+ 
```

+ /**
+  * å…¨å±€é”™è¯¯å¤„ç†ä¸­é—´ä»¶

+ const errorHandler = (err, req, res, next) => {
+   console.error('Error:', err);
+ 
+   // æ•°æ®åº“é”™è¯¯
+   if (err.code === 'ER_DUP_ENTRY') {
+     return res.status(400).json({
+       code: 400,
+       message: 'æ•°æ®å·²å­˜åœ¨',
+       timestamp: Date.now()
+     });
+   }
+

+   if (err.name === 'JsonWebTokenError') {
+     return res.status(401).json({
+       code: 401,
+       message: 'æ— æ•ˆçš„ä»¤ç‰Œ',
+       timestamp: Date.now()
+     });
+   }
+

+       timestamp: Date.now()

+     return res.status(400).json({

+       message: 'æ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ å¤±è´¥: ' + err.message,
+       timestamp: Date.now()

+     code: err.status || 500,
+     message: err.message || 'æœåŠ¡å™¨å†…éƒ¨é”™è¯¯',
+     ...(process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development' && { stack: err.stack }),
+     timestamp: Date.now()
+   });

+     path: req.originalUrl,

+ /**
+  * è¯·æ±‚æ—¥å¿—ä¸­é—´ä»¶
+  */
+ const requestLogger = (req, res, next) => {
+   const start = Date.now();
+   
+   // è®°å½•å“åº”å®Œæˆ
+   res.on('finish', () => {
+     const duration = Date.now() - start;
+     const log = {
+       method: req.method,
+       url: req.originalUrl,
+       status: res.statusCode,
+       duration: `${duration}ms`,
+       ip: req.ip,
+       userAgent: req.get('user-agent'),
+       timestamp: new Date().toISOString()
+     };
+     
+     // æ ¹æ®çŠ¶æ€ç ä½¿ç”¨ä¸åŒçš„æ—¥å¿—çº§åˆ«
+     if (res.statusCode >= 500) {
+       console.error('âŒ', JSON.stringify(log));
+     } else if (res.statusCode >= 400) {
+       console.warn('âš ï¸', JSON.stringify(log));
+     } else {
+       console.log('âœ…', JSON.stringify(log));
+     }
+   });
+   
+   next();
+ };
+ 
+ module.exports = requestLogger;
+

+ const bcrypt = require('bcryptjs');
+ const jwt = require('jsonwebtoken');
+ const { pool } = require('../config/database');
+ const config = require('../config');
+ const Response = require('../utils/response');
+ 
+ /**
+  * ç”¨æˆ·æ³¨å†Œ
+  */
+ const register = async (req, res) => {
+   try {
+     const { username, email, password } = req.body;
+     
+     // æ£€æŸ¥ç”¨æˆ·åæ˜¯å¦å·²å­˜åœ¨
+     const [existingUsers] = await pool.query(
+       'SELECT id FROM users WHERE username = ? OR email = ?',
+       [username, email]
+     );
+     
+     if (existingUsers.length > 0) {
+       return Response.error(res, 'ç”¨æˆ·åæˆ–é‚®ç®±å·²è¢«ä½¿ç”¨', 400);
+     }
+     
+     // åŠ å¯†å¯†ç 
+     const hashedPassword = await bcrypt.hash(password, 10);
+     
+     // åˆ›å»ºç”¨æˆ·
+     const [result] = await pool.query(
+       'INSERT INTO users (username, email, password, created_at) VALUES (?, ?, ?, NOW())',
+       [username, email, hashedPassword]
+     );
+     
+     const userId = result.insertId;
+     
+     // æŸ¥è¯¢æ–°åˆ›å»ºçš„ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯
+     const [users] = await pool.query(
+       'SELECT id, username, email, avatar, created_at FROM users WHERE id = ?',
+       [userId]
+     );
+     
+     return Response.created(res, users[0], 'æ³¨å†ŒæˆåŠŸ');
+   } catch (error) {
+     console.error('Register error:', error);
+     return Response.error(res, 'æ³¨å†Œå¤±è´¥', 500);
+   }
+ };
+ 
+ /**
+  * ç”¨æˆ·ç™»å½•
+  */
+ const login = async (req, res) => {
+   try {
+     const { username, password } = req.body;
+     
+     // æŸ¥è¯¢ç”¨æˆ·
+     const [users] = await pool.query(
+       'SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = ? OR email = ?',
+       [username, username]
+     );
+     
+     if (users.length === 0) {
+       return Response.error(res, 'ç”¨æˆ·åæˆ–å¯†ç é”™è¯¯', 401);
+     }
+     
+     const user = users[0];
+     
+     // éªŒè¯å¯†ç 
+     const isPasswordValid = await bcrypt.compare(password, user.password);
+     
+     if (!isPasswordValid) {
+       return Response.error(res, 'ç”¨æˆ·åæˆ–å¯†ç é”™è¯¯', 401);
+     }
+     
+     // ç”Ÿæˆè®¿é—®ä»¤ç‰Œ
+     const accessToken = jwt.sign(
+       {
+         id: user.id,
+         username: user.username,
+         email: user.email,
+         role: user.role || 'user'
+       },
+       config.jwt.secret,
+       { expiresIn: config.jwt.expiresIn }
+     );
+     
+     // ç”Ÿæˆåˆ·æ–°ä»¤ç‰Œ
+     const refreshToken = jwt.sign(
+       { id: user.id },
+       config.jwt.refreshSecret,
+       { expiresIn: config.jwt.refreshExpiresIn }
+     );
+     
+     // è¿”å›ç™»å½•ä¿¡æ¯
+     return Response.success(res, {
+       accessToken,
+       refreshToken,
+       expiresIn: 7200, // 2å°æ—¶ï¼Œå•ä½ï¼šç§’
+       user: {
+         id: user.id,
+         username: user.username,
+         email: user.email,
+         avatar: user.avatar,
+         role: user.role || 'user'
+       }
+     }, 'ç™»å½•æˆåŠŸ');
+   } catch (error) {
+     console.error('Login error:', error);
+     return Response.error(res, 'ç™»å½•å¤±è´¥', 500);
+   }
+ };
+ 
+ /**
+  * åˆ·æ–°ä»¤ç‰Œ
+  */
+ const refresh = async (req, res) => {
+   try {
+     const { refreshToken } = req.body;
+     
+     if (!refreshToken) {
+       return Response.error(res, 'è¯·æä¾›åˆ·æ–°ä»¤ç‰Œ', 400);
+     }
+     
+     // éªŒè¯åˆ·æ–°ä»¤ç‰Œ
+     const decoded = jwt.verify(refreshToken, config.jwt.refreshSecret);
+     
+     // æŸ¥è¯¢ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯
+     const [users] = await pool.query(
+       'SELECT id, username, email, role FROM users WHERE id = ?',
+       [decoded.id]
+     );
+     
+     if (users.length === 0) {
+       return Response.error(res, 'ç”¨æˆ·ä¸å­˜åœ¨', 404);
+     }
+     
+     const user = users[0];
+     
+     // ç”Ÿæˆæ–°çš„è®¿é—®ä»¤ç‰Œ
+     const accessToken = jwt.sign(
+       {
+         id: user.id,
+         username: user.username,
+         email: user.email,
+         role: user.role || 'user'
+       },
+       config.jwt.secret,
+       { expiresIn: config.jwt.expiresIn }
+     );
+     
+     return Response.success(res, {
+       accessToken,
+       expiresIn: 7200
+     }, 'ä»¤ç‰Œåˆ·æ–°æˆåŠŸ');
+   } catch (error) {
+     if (error.name === 'TokenExpiredError') {
+       return Response.error(res, 'åˆ·æ–°ä»¤ç‰Œå·²è¿‡æœŸï¼Œè¯·é‡æ–°ç™»å½•', 401);
+     }
+     console.error('Refresh token error:', error);
+     return Response.error(res, 'ä»¤ç‰Œåˆ·æ–°å¤±è´¥', 500);
+   }
+ };
+ 
+ /**
+  * è·å–å½“å‰ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯
+  */
+ const getCurrentUser = async (req, res) => {
+   try {
+     const userId = req.user.id;
+     
+     const [users] = await pool.query(
+       'SELECT id, username, email, avatar, role, created_at FROM users WHERE id = ?',
+       [userId]
+     );
+     
+     if (users.length === 0) {
+       return Response.error(res, 'ç”¨æˆ·ä¸å­˜åœ¨', 404);
+     }
+     
+     return Response.success(res, users[0]);
+   } catch (error) {
+     console.error('Get current user error:', error);
+     return Response.error(res, 'è·å–ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯å¤±è´¥', 500);
+   }
+ };
+ 
+ /**
+  * ç™»å‡ºï¼ˆå®¢æˆ·ç«¯åˆ é™¤tokenå³å¯ï¼‰
+  */
+ const logout = async (req, res) => {
+   return Response.success(res, null, 'ç™»å‡ºæˆåŠŸ');
+ };
+ 
+ module.exports = {
+   register,
+   login,
+   refresh,
+   getCurrentUser,
+   logout
+ };
+ 
```

+ const { pool } = require('../config/database');
+ const Response = require('../utils/response');
+ 
+ /**
+  * è·å–å°è¯´åˆ—è¡¨
+  */
+ const getNovelList = async (req, res) => {
+   try {
+     const {
+       page = 1,
+       pageSize = 20,
+       categoryId,
+       status,
+       sortBy = 'updated_at',
+       order = 'DESC'
+     } = req.query;
+     
+     const offset = (page - 1) * pageSize;
+     
+     // æ„å»ºæŸ¥è¯¢æ¡ä»¶
+     let whereClause = 'WHERE 1=1';
+     const params = [];
+     
+     if (categoryId) {
+       whereClause += ' AND category_id = ?';
+       params.push(categoryId);
+     }
+     
+     if (status) {
+       whereClause += ' AND status = ?';
+       params.push(status);
+     }
+     
+     // æŸ¥è¯¢æ€»æ•°
+     const [countResult] = await pool.query(
+       `SELECT COUNT(*) as total FROM novels ${whereClause}`,
+       params
+     );
+     const total = countResult[0].total;
+     
+     // æŸ¥è¯¢åˆ—è¡¨æ•°æ®
+     const [novels] = await pool.query(
+       `SELECT n.*, c.name as category_name 
+        FROM novels n 
+        LEFT JOIN categories c ON n.category_id = c.id 
+        ${whereClause}
+        ORDER BY ${sortBy} ${order}
+        LIMIT ? OFFSET ?`,
+       [...params, parseInt(pageSize), offset]
+     );
+     
+     return Response.paginate(res, novels, {
+       page: parseInt(page),
+       pageSize: parseInt(pageSize),
+       total
+     });
+   } catch (error) {
+     console.error('Get novel list error:', error);
+     return Response.error(res, 'è·å–å°è¯´åˆ—è¡¨å¤±è´¥', 500);
+   }
+ };
+ 
+ /**
+  * è·å–å°è¯´è¯¦æƒ…
+  */
+ const getNovelDetail = async (req, res) => {
+   try {
+     const { id } = req.params;
+     
+     const [novels] = await pool.query(
+       `SELECT n.*, c.name as category_name,
+               (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM chapters WHERE novel_id = n.id) as chapter_count
+        FROM novels n
+        LEFT JOIN categories c ON n.category_id = c.id
+        WHERE n.id = ?`,
+       [id]
+     );
+     
+     if (novels.length === 0) {
+       return Response.error(res, 'å°è¯´ä¸å­˜åœ¨', 404);
+     }
+     
+     // æ›´æ–°æµè§ˆé‡
+     await pool.query(
+       'UPDATE novels SET views = views + 1 WHERE id = ?',
+       [id]
+     );
+     
+     return Response.success(res, novels[0]);
+   } catch (error) {
+     console.error('Get novel detail error:', error);
+     return Response.error(res, 'è·å–å°è¯´è¯¦æƒ…å¤±è´¥', 500);
+   }
+ };
+ 
+ /**
+  * è·å–æ¨èå°è¯´
+  */
+ const getRecommendNovels = async (req, res) => {
+   try {
+     const { limit = 10 } = req.query;
+     
+     const [novels] = await pool.query(
+       `SELECT n.*, c.name as category_name
+        FROM novels n
+        LEFT JOIN categories c ON n.category_id = c.id
+        WHERE n.status = 'published'
+        ORDER BY n.views DESC, n.rating DESC
+        LIMIT ?`,
+       [parseInt(limit)]
+     );
+     
+     return Response.success(res, novels);
+   } catch (error) {
+     console.error('Get recommend novels error:', error);
+     return Response.error(res, 'è·å–æ¨èå°è¯´å¤±è´¥', 500);
+   }
+ };
+ 
+ /**
+  * è·å–ç« èŠ‚åˆ—è¡¨
+  */
+ const getChapterList = async (req, res) => {
+   try {
+     const { novelId } = req.params;
+     const { page = 1, pageSize = 50 } = req.query;
+     
+     const offset = (page - 1) * pageSize;
+     
+     // æŸ¥è¯¢æ€»æ•°
+     const [countResult] = await pool.query(
+       'SELECT COUNT(*) as total FROM chapters WHERE novel_id = ?',
+       [novelId]
+     );
+     const total = countResult[0].total;
+     
+     // æŸ¥è¯¢ç« èŠ‚åˆ—è¡¨
+     const [chapters] = await pool.query(
+       `SELECT id, novel_id, chapter_number, title, word_count, 
+               is_free, created_at, updated_at
+        FROM chapters
+        WHERE novel_id = ?
+        ORDER BY chapter_number ASC
+        LIMIT ? OFFSET ?`,
+       [novelId, parseInt(pageSize), offset]
+     );
+     
+     return Response.paginate(res, chapters, {
+       page: parseInt(page),
+       pageSize: parseInt(pageSize),
+       total
+     });
+   } catch (error) {
+     console.error('Get chapter list error:', error);
+     return Response.error(res, 'è·å–ç« èŠ‚åˆ—è¡¨å¤±è´¥', 500);
+   }
+ };
+ 
+ /**
+  * è·å–ç« èŠ‚å†…å®¹
+  */
+ const getChapterContent = async (req, res) => {
+   try {
+     const { id } = req.params;
+     
+     const [chapters] = await pool.query(
+       'SELECT * FROM chapters WHERE id = ?',
+       [id]
+     );
+     
+     if (chapters.length === 0) {
+       return Response.error(res, 'ç« èŠ‚ä¸å­˜åœ¨', 404);
+     }
+     
+     return Response.success(res, chapters[0]);
+   } catch (error) {
+     console.error('Get chapter content error:', error);
+     return Response.error(res, 'è·å–ç« èŠ‚å†…å®¹å¤±è´¥', 500);
+   }
+ };
+ 
+ /**
+  * æœç´¢å°è¯´
+  */
+ const searchNovels = async (req, res) => {
+   try {
+     const { keyword, page = 1, pageSize = 20 } = req.query;
+     
+     if (!keyword) {
+       return Response.error(res, 'è¯·è¾“å…¥æœç´¢å…³é”®è¯', 400);
+     }
+     
+     const offset = (page - 1) * pageSize;
+     const searchTerm = `%${keyword}%`;
+     
+     // æŸ¥è¯¢æ€»æ•°
+     const [countResult] = await pool.query(
+       'SELECT COUNT(*) as total FROM novels WHERE title LIKE ? OR author LIKE ? OR description LIKE ?',
+       [searchTerm, searchTerm, searchTerm]
+     );
+     const total = countResult[0].total;
+     
+     // æœç´¢å°è¯´
+     const [novels] = await pool.query(
+       `SELECT n.*, c.name as category_name
+        FROM novels n
+        LEFT JOIN categories c ON n.category_id = c.id
+        WHERE n.title LIKE ? OR n.author LIKE ? OR n.description LIKE ?
+        ORDER BY n.views DESC
+        LIMIT ? OFFSET ?`,
+       [searchTerm, searchTerm, searchTerm, parseInt(pageSize), offset]
+     );
+     
+     return Response.paginate(res, novels, {
+       page: parseInt(page),
+       pageSize: parseInt(pageSize),
+       total
+     });
+   } catch (error) {
+     console.error('Search novels error:', error);
+     return Response.error(res, 'æœç´¢å¤±è´¥', 500);
+   }
+ };
+ 
+ /**
+  * è·å–åˆ†ç±»åˆ—è¡¨
+  */
+ const getCategories = async (req, res) => {
+   try {
+     const [categories] = await pool.query(
+       'SELECT * FROM categories ORDER BY sort_order ASC, id ASC'
+     );
+     
+     return Response.success(res, categories);
+   } catch (error) {
+     console.error('Get categories error:', error);
+     return Response.error(res, 'è·å–åˆ†ç±»åˆ—è¡¨å¤±è´¥', 500);
+   }
+ };
+ 
+ module.exports = {
+   getNovelList,
+   getNovelDetail,
+   getRecommendNovels,
+   getChapterList,
+   getChapterContent,
+   searchNovels,
+   getCategories
+ };
+ 
```

+ const { pool } = require('../config/database');
+ const Response = require('../utils/response');

+ /**
+  * è·å–ç”¨æˆ·ä¹¦æ¶
+  */
+ const getBookshelf = async (req, res) => {
+   try {
+     const userId = req.user.id;
+     const { page = 1, pageSize = 20 } = req.query;
+     
+     const offset = (page - 1) * pageSize;
+     
+     // æŸ¥è¯¢æ€»æ•°
+     const [countResult] = await pool.query(
+       'SELECT COUNT(*) as total FROM bookshelf WHERE user_id = ?',
+       [userId]
+     );
+     const total = countResult[0].total;
+     
+     // æŸ¥è¯¢ä¹¦æ¶æ•°æ®
+     const [bookshelf] = await pool.query(
+       `SELECT b.*, n.title, n.author, n.cover, n.category_id, c.name as category_name,
+               rp.chapter_id as current_chapter_id, rp.progress as reading_progress
+        FROM bookshelf b
+        INNER JOIN novels n ON b.novel_id = n.id
+        LEFT JOIN categories c ON n.category_id = c.id
+        LEFT JOIN reading_progress rp ON rp.user_id = b.user_id AND rp.novel_id = b.novel_id
+        WHERE b.user_id = ?
+        ORDER BY b.updated_at DESC
+        LIMIT ? OFFSET ?`,
+       [userId, parseInt(pageSize), offset]
+     );
+     
+     return Response.paginate(res, bookshelf, {
+       page: parseInt(page),
+       pageSize: parseInt(pageSize),
+       total
+     });
+   } catch (error) {
+     console.error('Get bookshelf error:', error);
+     return Response.error(res, 'è·å–ä¹¦æ¶å¤±è´¥', 500);
+   }
+ };
+ 
+ /**
+  * æ·»åŠ åˆ°ä¹¦æ¶
+  */
+ const addToBookshelf = async (req, res) => {
+   try {
+     const userId = req.user.id;
+     const { novelId } = req.body;
+     
+     // æ£€æŸ¥å°è¯´æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨
+     const [novels] = await pool.query(
+       'SELECT id FROM novels WHERE id = ?',
+       [novelId]
+     );
+     
+     if (novels.length === 0) {
+       return Response.error(res, 'å°è¯´ä¸å­˜åœ¨', 404);
+     }
+     
+     // æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦å·²åœ¨ä¹¦æ¶
+     const [existing] = await pool.query(
+       'SELECT id FROM bookshelf WHERE user_id = ? AND novel_id = ?',
+       [userId, novelId]
+     );
+     
+     if (existing.length > 0) {
+       return Response.error(res, 'è¯¥å°è¯´å·²åœ¨ä¹¦æ¶ä¸­', 400);
+     }
+     
+     // æ·»åŠ åˆ°ä¹¦æ¶
+     await pool.query(
+       'INSERT INTO bookshelf (user_id, novel_id, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (?, ?, NOW(), NOW())',
+       [userId, novelId]
+     );
+     
+     return Response.created(res, null, 'æ·»åŠ æˆåŠŸ');
+   } catch (error) {
+     console.error('Add to bookshelf error:', error);
+     return Response.error(res, 'æ·»åŠ å¤±è´¥', 500);
+   }
+ };
+ 
+ /**
+  * ä»ä¹¦æ¶ç§»é™¤
+  */
+ const removeFromBookshelf = async (req, res) => {
+   try {
+     const userId = req.user.id;
+     const { novelId } = req.params;
+     
+     await pool.query(
+       'DELETE FROM bookshelf WHERE user_id = ? AND novel_id = ?',
+       [userId, novelId]
+     );
+     
+     return Response.success(res, null, 'ç§»é™¤æˆåŠŸ');
+   } catch (error) {
+     console.error('Remove from bookshelf error:', error);
+     return Response.error(res, 'ç§»é™¤å¤±è´¥', 500);
+   }
+ };
+ 
+ /**
+  * è·å–é˜…è¯»è¿›åº¦
+  */
+ const getReadingProgress = async (req, res) => {
+   try {
+     const userId = req.user.id;
+     const { novelId } = req.params;
+     
+     const [progress] = await pool.query(
+       'SELECT * FROM reading_progress WHERE user_id = ? AND novel_id = ?',
+       [userId, novelId]
+     );
+     
+     if (progress.length === 0) {
+       return Response.success(res, null);
+     }
+     
+     return Response.success(res, progress[0]);
+   } catch (error) {
+     console.error('Get reading progress error:', error);
+     return Response.error(res, 'è·å–é˜…è¯»è¿›åº¦å¤±è´¥', 500);
+   }
+ };
+ 
+ /**
+  * æ›´æ–°é˜…è¯»è¿›åº¦
+  */
+ const updateReadingProgress = async (req, res) => {
+   try {
+     const userId = req.user.id;
+     const { novelId, chapterId, progress } = req.body;
+     
+     // æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦å·²æœ‰è®°å½•
+     const [existing] = await pool.query(
+       'SELECT id FROM reading_progress WHERE user_id = ? AND novel_id = ?',
+       [userId, novelId]
+     );
+     
+     if (existing.length > 0) {
+       // æ›´æ–°
+       await pool.query(
+         'UPDATE reading_progress SET chapter_id = ?, progress = ?, updated_at = NOW() WHERE user_id = ? AND novel_id = ?',
+         [chapterId, progress, userId, novelId]
+       );
+     } else {
+       // æ’å…¥
+       await pool.query(
+         'INSERT INTO reading_progress (user_id, novel_id, chapter_id, progress, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, NOW(), NOW())',
+         [userId, novelId, chapterId, progress]
+       );
+     }
+     
+     // åŒæ—¶æ·»åŠ åˆ°é˜…è¯»å†å²
+     await pool.query(
+       'INSERT INTO reading_history (user_id, novel_id, chapter_id, read_at) VALUES (?, ?, ?, NOW())',
+       [userId, novelId, chapterId]
+     );
+     
+     return Response.success(res, null, 'æ›´æ–°æˆåŠŸ');
+   } catch (error) {
+     console.error('Update reading progress error:', error);
+     return Response.error(res, 'æ›´æ–°å¤±è´¥', 500);
+   }
+ };
+ 
+ /**
+  * è·å–é˜…è¯»å†å²
+  */
+ const getReadingHistory = async (req, res) => {
+   try {
+     const userId = req.user.id;
+     const { page = 1, pageSize = 20 } = req.query;
+     
+     const offset = (page - 1) * pageSize;
+     
+     // æŸ¥è¯¢æ€»æ•°
+     const [countResult] = await pool.query(
+       'SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT novel_id) as total FROM reading_history WHERE user_id = ?',
+       [userId]
+     );
+     const total = countResult[0].total;
+     
+     // æŸ¥è¯¢é˜…è¯»å†å²
+     const [history] = await pool.query(
+       `SELECT rh.*, n.title, n.author, n.cover, c.title as chapter_title
+        FROM reading_history rh
+        INNER JOIN novels n ON rh.novel_id = n.id
+        LEFT JOIN chapters c ON rh.chapter_id = c.id
+        WHERE rh.user_id = ?
+        GROUP BY rh.novel_id
+        ORDER BY MAX(rh.read_at) DESC
+        LIMIT ? OFFSET ?`,
+       [userId, parseInt(pageSize), offset]
+     );
+     
+     return Response.paginate(res, history, {
+       page: parseInt(page),
+       pageSize: parseInt(pageSize),
+       total
+     });
+   } catch (error) {
+     console.error('Get reading history error:', error);
+     return Response.error(res, 'è·å–é˜…è¯»å†å²å¤±è´¥', 500);
+   }
+ };
+ 
+ module.exports = {
+   getBookshelf,
+   addToBookshelf,
+   removeFromBookshelf,
+   getReadingProgress,
+   updateReadingProgress,
+   getReadingHistory
+ };

+ const express = require('express');
+ const cors = require('cors');
+ const helmet = require('helmet');
+ const compression = require('compression');
+ const rateLimit = require('express-rate-limit');
+ const config = require('./config');
+ const { testConnection } = require('./config/database');
+ const routes = require('./routes');
+ const { errorHandler, notFound } = require('./middlewares/errorHandler');
+ const requestLogger = require('./middlewares/logger');
+ 
+ // åˆ›å»ºExpressåº”ç”¨
+ const app = express();
+ 
+ // ================== ä¸­é—´ä»¶é…ç½® ==================
+ 
+ // å®‰å…¨å¤´éƒ¨
+ app.use(helmet());
+ 
+ // è·¨åŸŸé…ç½®
+ app.use(cors(config.cors));
+ 
+ // è¯·æ±‚ä½“è§£æ
+ app.use(express.json({ limit: '10mb' }));
+ app.use(express.urlencoded({ extended: true, limit: '10mb' }));
+ 
+ // å“åº”å‹ç¼©
+ app.use(compression());
+ 
+ // è¯·æ±‚æ—¥å¿—
+ app.use(requestLogger);
+ 
+ // é™æµé…ç½®
+ const limiter = rateLimit({
+   windowMs: 15 * 60 * 1000, // 15åˆ†é’Ÿ
+   max: 100, // é™åˆ¶100ä¸ªè¯·æ±‚
+   message: {
+     code: 429,
+     message: 'è¯·æ±‚è¿‡äºé¢‘ç¹ï¼Œè¯·ç¨åå†è¯•',
+     timestamp: Date.now()
+   }
+ });
+ 
+ // åº”ç”¨é™æµï¼ˆä»…åœ¨ç”Ÿäº§ç¯å¢ƒï¼‰
+ if (config.server.env === 'production') {
+   app.use(limiter);
+ }
+ 
+ // ================== è·¯ç”±é…ç½® ==================
+ 
+ // é™æ€æ–‡ä»¶ï¼ˆä¸Šä¼ ç›®å½•ï¼‰
+ app.use('/uploads', express.static('uploads'));
+ 
+ // æ³¨å†Œæ‰€æœ‰è·¯ç”±
